actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the fiscal year 1976 and 1977 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Commerce.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for fiscal years 1976 and 1977 to the Department of Commerce for: (1) acquisition, construction, or reconstruction of ships; (2) payment of obligations incurred for ship operating-differential subsidy; (3) research and development; (4) reserve fleet; (5) training at the Merchant Marine Academy; (6) financial assistance to State Marine Schools, and (7) increases in employee salary and benefits.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the fiscal year 1976 and 1977 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Commerce.
